calculateBearingToNextWaypoint() - Method in class game.struct.Plane
Calculates bearing from plane's current position to its next waypoint This is done so planes follow their flight plan automatically

configurePlaneForTakeOff(Plane) - Method in class game.struct.Game
Configure plane to take off properly It adds the runway waypoints to its flight plan, inserts the flight in the airport spot and signals that a plane needs to take off
